QAData.question: Who won between Everton and Brighton & Hove Albion on Sun, 02 Jan 2022 14:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Brighton & Hove Albion won 3–2 over Everton on Sun, 02 Jan 2022 14:00:00 GMT.
